About the Company: Universal Office Automation Ltd was formed to manufacture and lead the complete range of mini Computers, Micro processor based systems, Electronics Instruments, Micrographic and reprograhic equipment and manufacturing and marketing of electronic EPABX systems and electronics teleprinters.Universal is partner to the worlds best Voice and Data Manufacturers. Mitel Networks and Avaya Communication, are the main voice partners. Cisco and Hewlett Packard are the data centric partners.The services offered by the company includes Telephony  Avaya,Telephony Mitel,Data,Cabling,Network Services,Project Management,Engineering,Support and Consultancy.
